DOC.brief_summary: For 12 month approvement University Yonsei institutional review board , 59 patient old 20 year refer medical center EUS-FNA FNB , consecutive pancreatic lesion evaluate inclusion prospective study . The inclusion criterion study follow : diagnose suspect solid pancreatic mass accord clinical evaluation image study need histologic tissue confirmation EUS-FNA EUS-FNB . The exclusion criterion follow : cystic pancreatic lesion , patient haemodynamically unstable severe coagulopathy ( international normalize ratio [ INR ] > 1.5 platelet count < 50,000 cells/cubic millimeter [ cmm3 ] ) , patient unable suspend anticoagulant/anti-platelet therapy , pregnancy , inability refusal give inform consent , refusal participate study . Patients undergo anticoagulant anti- platelet therapy non-critical problem discontinue treatment least 5 day endoscopic procedure . Written inform consent obtain patient procedure perform participation study , study protocol approve University Yonsei institutional review board . All patient underwent procedure conscious sedation propofol midazolam accord current guidelines.8 After procedure , patient monitor least six hour order immediately detect post-procedural complication follow 7 day order detect late complication .
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Ultrasound-guided Fine Needle Biopsy With 25-gauge Biopsy Needles Solid Pancreatic Masses
DOC.criteria: Patients older 20 year refer medical center EUSFNA FNB diagnose suspect solid pancreatic mass accord clinical evaluation image study cystic pancreatic lesion , patient haemodynamically unstable severe coagulopathy ( international normalize ratio [ INR ] > 1.5 platelet count < 50,000 cells/cubic millimeter [ cmm3 ] ) , patient unable suspend anticoagulant/antiplatelet therapy , pregnancy , inability refusal give inform consent , refusal participate study .
